|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ5322; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8386; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC<!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN6224; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax/be |rad2be = 5764.7 |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}
==Overview== *Xiaomi Router BE6500 Pro - Hub Gateway, IPTV, 2.5G, Ethernet Port 1GB :Large Memory, OFDMA, IPV6, WPA3, Repeater Modem,$ Signal Amplifier
{{See also|List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/xiaomi-router-6500-pro/191281 ''Xiaomi BE6500 Pro'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
==See also== :;[[List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices]] *[[Xiaomi BE3600]] (RD15) • BE3600 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Xiaomi Router BE3600'' (RC07) • ''Qualcomm Immersive Home'' • [https://www.acwifi.net/26827.html AC|WiFi] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ5312 (4x @1.1GHz), QCN6402, YT8821C, 256/512MB *[[Xiaomi BE6500 Pro]] • BE6500 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Xiaomi Router BE6500 Pro'' (RD08) • ''Qualcomm Immersive Home 3210'' • [https://post.m.smzdm.com/p/arqxovmx/ Spec.] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ5332 (4x @1.5GHz), QCN6274 (QCN6432), 128/1024MB, NFC *[[Xiaomi BE7000]] • BE7000 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Xiaomi Router 7000'' (RC06) • ''Qualcomm Networking Pro'' • [https://www.acwifi.net/24559.html AC|WiFi] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ9554 (4x @1.5GHz), QCN5024/QCN6224, 128/1024MB *[[Xiaomi BE10000]] • BE10000 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :[[Xiaomi Router 10G]] (RC01) • ''Qualcomm Networking Pro'' • [https://www.acwifi.net/23365.html AC|WiFi] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ9570 (4x @2.2GHz), QCN6214/2x QCN6274, 256/2048MB
